home.name: Hi, I'm Joaquin Villarreal
home.description: Transforming ideas into digital experiences with code and creativity, specializing in elegant and user-centered web applications.

vintex.title: Vintex
vintex.description: I work as a freelance and part-time software developer. I handle software development projects from time to time.

fooTalent.title: Foo Talent
fooTalent.description: I contributed to the development of interactive and secure web applications in a renowned law startup in Peru.
items: Designed user interfaces to enhance the user experience on various devices.
Collaborated effectively in development teams, facilitating communication and problem-solving.
Continuously maintained and improved code quality and performance.

freelance.title: Freelance Developer
freelance.description: I have been freelancing on various projects since March 2022.

proyect1.title: Expense Manager
proyect1.description: A simple and efficient expense manager created with Next.js to help you track income, expenses, and visualize your financial data.

proyect2.title: Rooms (Real-Time Room Project)
proyect2.description: This is a real-time chat system project developed with the aim of implementing the Socket.io library and exploring technologies such as React, TypeScript, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and JWT.

proyect3.title: Travel Nest
proyect3.description: Platform for managing apartment rentals, with booking, registration, and authentication features. Incorporates advanced security measures with access and refresh tokens. Uses the Google Maps API for location and ChatGPT for personalized apartment recommendations.

proyect4.title: Reading List
proyect4.description: It is a mini-store where users can drag and drop the desired book to a reading list. It has data persistence with localStorage and synchronization between tabs. It is built with React, TypeScript, and Styled Components.

proyect5.title: Reclama Smart (Freelance Project)
proyect5.description: Freelance project, creation of a website for a startup of lawyers.

proyect6.title: Pokemon Game 'Who Is That Pokemon'
proyect6.description: Pokémon game project where users guess names to earn points. It uses React for the interface and an external API to obtain Pokémon information. The goal is to accumulate the most points before losing all lives.

contact.title: Contact
contact.paragraph1: Nice to meet you! If you have any questions, collaboration proposals, or just want to chat, feel free to get in touch with me.
contact.paragraph2: At the moment, I prefer to avoid creating forms to simplify the contact process. However, you can send me an email or connect with me on LinkedIn using the following links:
